suggest.meta_description: Explore how Edge Functions and Edge Firewall utilize metadata for enhanced security, including GeoIP, TLS, and remote client details to manage and secure access.

current.meta_description: The edge functions on Edge Firewall have access to a set of metadata that can be manipulated to filter and manage access to your application an apply specific logic in different scenarios.
